feature.label: Project configurators for commonly used maven plugins (temporary)
feature.description:
Project configurators for some commonly used maven plugins.
Included project configurators
org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-component-annotations:*:generate-metadata,generate-test-metadata org.codehaus.modello:modello-maven-plugin:[1.0.1,):* org.codehaus.mojo:build-helper-maven-plugin:*:*
Included generic project configurators
org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-eclipse-plugin:*:eclipse,m2eclipse org.codehaus.mojo:sysdeo-tomcat-maven-plugin:*:sysdeo-tomcat,m2eclipse
